revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Radxa |model=Rock Pi CM3 |revision=+ (D2E8) V1.2 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=05/2022 |type=SoM |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3568 |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Foresee |fla1_model=KREC4A1MA1A2C1 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H9HCNNNBKMML-HRNME |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Power Management IC;Rockchip;RK809-5;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;Union Semi;UM3204;;1;,,, 18V 5A Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;SCT;SCT2250;;1;,,, 5A Synchronous Step-Down DC-DC Converter;Tctek;TCS4525;;1;,,, 2A 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8089A;;1;,,, High-PSRR 500mA LDO;Powtech;PT5108;;1; }} {{TagLine|Rockchip RK3568 Compute Module}} :[https://wiki.radxa.com/Rock3/CM/CM3I Product page]
"Rock Pi Compute Module 3 Plus V1.2" and "20220520" are :silkscreened on the SoM module.
Vendor website and some documentation use "Radxa CM3 Industrial" :to refer to the device.
{{See also|Radxa|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3568 Quad-Core @2.0GHz :SoC: ARM (Cortex-A55); NPU: 0.8 TOPS *GPU: ''Mali-G52'' (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.0) :VPU (w/ 4K VP9, 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR4X) SDRAM *Expansion: 4x 100P 0.4mm pitch (B2B connectors) *Power Source: 5V (via connectors)
==Images== <gallery> File:Rock_Pi_CM3+_(D2E8)_Top.jpeg|SoM top File:Rock_Pi_CM3+_(D2E8)_Bottom.jpeg|SoM bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
